languages.text: {n}Глаза женщины округляются от удивления.{/n} "А ведь вы правы! Зачем мне разваливающийся особняк, полный крыс? И унылый вид из окна? Я же всю жизнь мечтала о межпланетном путешествии. Паломничество, да! Продам дом и то, что осталось от лавки, и возьму билет в один конец. И, да смилуется надо мной Император, помру счастливая до того, как закончатся все мои сбережения!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Глаза женщины округляются от удивления.{/n} "А ведь вы правы! Зачем мне разваливающийся особняк, полный крыс? И унылый вид из окна? Я же всю жизнь мечтала о межпланетном путешествии. Паломничество, да! На один из миров удовольстваий! Продам дом и то, что осталось от лавки, и возьму билет в один конец. И, да смилуется надо мной Император, помру счастливая до того, как закончатся все мои сбережения!"
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady

languages.text: {n}The woman's eyes go round in surprise.{/n} "Why, I think you're right! What do I want with a tumbledown manor house full of rats? And a depressing view from the window? My whole life I have dreamt of interplanetary travel. A pilgrimage, that's it! I'll sell the house and what's left of the shop, and I'll buy a one-way ticket. And, Emperor willing, I will die happy before my savings run out!"
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза женщины округляются от удивления.{/n} "А ведь вы правы! Зачем мне разваливающийся особняк, полный крыс? И унылый вид из окна? Я же всю жизнь мечтала о межпланетном путешествии. Паломничество, да! Продам дом и то, что осталось от лавки, и возьму билет в один конец. И, да смилуется надо мной Император, помру счастливая до того, как закончатся все мои сбережения!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman's eyes go round in surprise.{/n} "Why, I think you're right! What do I want with a tumbledown manor house full of rats? And a depressing view from the window? My whole life I have dreamed of interplanetary travel. A pilgrimage, that's it! To one of the pleasure worlds! I'll sell the house and what's left of the shop, and I'll buy a one-way ticket. And, Emperor willing, I will die happy before my savings run out!"
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman's eyes go round in surprise.{/n} "Why, I think you're right! What do I want with a tumbledown manor house full of rats? And a depressing view from the window? My whole life I have dreamed of interplanetary travel. A pilgrimage, that's it! To one of the pleasure worlds! I'll sell the house and what's left of the shop, and I'll buy a one-way ticket. And, Emperor willing, I will die happy before my savings run out!"
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman's eyes go round in surprise.{/n} "Why, I think you're right! What do I want with a tumbledown manor house full of rats? And a depressing view from the window? My whole life I have dreamed of interplanetary travel. A pilgrimage, that's it! To one of the pleasure worlds! I'll sell the house and what's left of the shop, and I'll buy a one-way ticket. And, Emperor willing, I will die happy before my savings run out!"
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman's eyes go round in surprise.{/n} "Why, I think you're right! What do I want with a tumbledown manor house full of rats? And a depressing view from the window? My whole life I have dreamt of interplanetary travel. A pilgrimage, that's it! I'll sell the house and what's left of the shop, and I'll buy a one-way ticket. And, Emperor willing, I will die happy before my savings run out!"
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady

languages.text: {n}女人惊讶地瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“我的天啊，你说得真是太对了！我干嘛要呆在那个到处都是老鼠的破庄园里，看着窗外那令人压抑的景色呢？我这辈子都梦想着能来场星际旅行。是时候进行一场朝圣之旅了，没错！我准备卖掉房子和破破烂烂的店铺，之后买张单程票。愿帝皇保佑，希望我能在积蓄花光之前痛痛快快地咽气！”
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's eyes go round in surprise.{/n} "Why, I think you're right! What do I want with a tumbledown manor house full of rats? And a depressing view from the window? My whole life I have dreamt of interplanetary travel. A pilgrimage, that's it! I'll sell the house and what's left of the shop, and I'll buy a one-way ticket. And, Emperor willing, I will die happy before my savings run out!"

traits.locale_text: {n}女人惊讶地瞪大了眼睛。{/n}“我的天啊，你说得真是太对了！我干嘛要呆在那个到处都是老鼠的破庄园里，看着窗外那令人压抑的景色呢？我这辈子都梦想着能来场星际旅行。是时候进行一场朝圣之旅了，没错！就去某个欢愉世界吧！我准备卖掉房子和破破烂烂的店铺，之后买张单程票。愿帝皇保佑，希望我能在积蓄花光之前痛痛快快地咽气！”
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady

languages.text: {n}La mujer se queda ojiplática.{/n} «¡Vaya, creo que tiene razón! ¿Para qué quiero una mansión en la ruina y llena de ratas, y además con unas vistas deprimentes? Me he pasado la vida soñando con el viaje interplanetario. ¡Un peregrinaje, eso es! Venderé la casa y lo que queda de la tienda y me compraré un billete de solo ida. ¡Y, si el Emperador quiere, moriré feliz antes de que se me acaben los ahorros!».
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's eyes go round in surprise.{/n} "Why, I think you're right! What do I want with a tumbledown manor house full of rats? And a depressing view from the window? My whole life I have dreamt of interplanetary travel. A pilgrimage, that's it! I'll sell the house and what's left of the shop, and I'll buy a one-way ticket. And, Emperor willing, I will die happy before my savings run out!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La mujer se queda ojiplática.{/n} «¡Vaya, creo que tiene razón! ¿Para qué quiero una mansión en la ruina y llena de ratas, y además con unas vistas deprimentes? Me he pasado la vida soñando con el viaje interplanetario. ¡Un peregrinaje, eso es! ¡A uno de los mundos del placer! Venderé la casa y lo que queda de la tienda y me compraré un billete de solo ida. ¡Y, si el Emperador quiere, moriré feliz antes de que se me acaben los ahorros!».
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady

languages.text: {n}女性は驚いて目を丸くする。{/n}「まあ、仰るとおりです！ネズミでいっぱいの倒れかけた領主の邸宅に何を求めていたのでしょう。窓から見える憂うつな景色に何を求めていたのでしょう。私は生涯、惑星間旅行をしたいと夢見ていたのに。巡礼に出ましょう、それがいいわ！家と店に残った商品を売り払って片道切符を買いましょう。皇帝の御心のままに、貯金を使い果たす前に幸福な死を迎えます！」
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's eyes go round in surprise.{/n} "Why, I think you're right! What do I want with a tumbledown manor house full of rats? And a depressing view from the window? My whole life I have dreamt of interplanetary travel. A pilgrimage, that's it! I'll sell the house and what's left of the shop, and I'll buy a one-way ticket. And, Emperor willing, I will die happy before my savings run out!"

traits.locale_text: {n}女性は驚いて目を丸くする。{/n}「まあ、仰るとおりです！ネズミでいっぱいの倒れかけた領主の邸宅に何を求めていたのでしょう。窓から見える憂うつな景色に何を求めていたのでしょう。私は生涯、惑星間旅行をしたいと夢見ていたのに。巡礼に出ましょう、それがいいわ！家と店に残った商品を売り払って片道切符を買いましょう。皇帝の御心のままに、貯金を使い果たす前に幸福な死を迎えます！」
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady

languages.text: {n}Les yeux de la femme s'écarquillent de surprise.{/n} « Ma foi, c'est une excellente idée ! Qu'ai-je à faire d'un manoir en ruine infesté de rats ? Pourquoi passerais-je le restant de mes jours à contempler la vue déprimante qui s'offre à moi depuis ses fenêtres ? Depuis le temps que je rêve de sillonner la galaxie, je vais partir en pèlerinage ! C'est décidé ! Je n'aurai qu'à vendre la maison et ce qu'il reste de la boutique pour m'acheter un aller simple. Et, si l'Empereur le veut, je mourrai heureuse avant d'avoir dépensé toutes mes économies ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's eyes go round in surprise.{/n} "Why, I think you're right! What do I want with a tumbledown manor house full of rats? And a depressing view from the window? My whole life I have dreamt of interplanetary travel. A pilgrimage, that's it! I'll sell the house and what's left of the shop, and I'll buy a one-way ticket. And, Emperor willing, I will die happy before my savings run out!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux de la femme s'écarquillent de surprise.{/n} « Ma foi, c'est une excellente idée ! Qu'ai-je à faire d'un manoir en ruine infesté de rats ? Pourquoi passerais-je le restant de mes jours à contempler la vue déprimante qui s'offre à moi depuis ses fenêtres ? Depuis le temps que je rêve de sillonner la galaxie, je vais partir en pèlerinage ! C'est décidé ! Je n'aurai qu'à vendre la maison et ce qu'il reste de la boutique pour m'acheter un aller simple pour l'un des mondes paradis. Et, si l'Empereur le veut, je mourrai heureuse avant d'avoir dépensé toutes mes économies ! »
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady

languages.text: {n}Die Frau reißt überrascht die Augen auf.{/n} "Ja, Ihr habt recht! Was will ich mit einer heruntergekommenen Villa voller Ratten? Und einer deprimierenden Aussicht? Ich habe mein Leben lang von einer interplanetaren Reise geträumt. Ich mache eine Pilgerreise! Ich verkaufe das Haus und den Rest des Ladens und kaufe mir ein Ticket ohne Rückflug. Und so der Imperator will werde ich glücklich sterben, ehe meine Ersparnisse erschöpft sind!"
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's eyes go round in surprise.{/n} "Why, I think you're right! What do I want with a tumbledown manor house full of rats? And a depressing view from the window? My whole life I have dreamt of interplanetary travel. A pilgrimage, that's it! I'll sell the house and what's left of the shop, and I'll buy a one-way ticket. And, Emperor willing, I will die happy before my savings run out!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Augen der Frau weiten sich überrascht.{/n} "Hm, da habt Ihr wohl recht! Was soll ich mit einem abgewirtschafteten Anwesen voller Ratten? Und einem deprimierenden Blick aus dem Fenster? Mein ganzes Leben habe ich von interplanetaren Reisen geträumt. Eine Pilgerfahrt, das ist es! Zu einer der Vergnügungswelten! Ich verkaufe das Haus und die Reste des Geschäfts und kaufe mir ein Ticket ohne Rückfahrkarte. Und so der Imperator es wünscht, werde ich glücklich sterben, bevor mir die Ersparnisse ausgehen!"
traits.speaker: AdministratumOldNobleLady

languages.text: {n}Kadının gözleri şaşkınlık içinde açılıyor.{/n} "Aslında haklı olabilirsiniz! Sıçanlarla dolu, yıkık dökük bir malikâneyi neyleyim ben? Hem o pencereden bakınca gördüğüm iç karartan manzara yok mu? Ömrüm boyunca gezegenler arasında seyahat etmenin hayalini kurdum. Hacca gitmeliyim, evet! Evimi ve dükkândan geriye kalanları satıp sadece gidiş bileti satın alacağım. İmparator kısmet ederse birikmiş param bitmeden mutlu mesut öleceğim!"
languages.original_text: {n}The woman's eyes go round in surprise.{/n} "Why, I think you're right! What do I want with a tumbledown manor house full of rats? And a depressing view from the window? My whole life I have dreamt of interplanetary travel. A pilgrimage, that's it! I'll sell the house and what's left of the shop, and I'll buy a one-way ticket. And, Emperor willing, I will die happy before my savings run out!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kadının gözleri şaşkınlık içinde açılıyor.{/n} "Aslında haklı olabilirsiniz! Sıçanlarla dolu, yıkık dökük bir malikâneyi neyleyim ben? Hem o pencereden bakınca gördüğüm iç karartan manzara yok mu? Ömrüm boyunca gezegenler arasında seyahat etmenin hayalini kurdum. Hacca gitmeliyim, evet! Evimi ve dükkândan geriye kalanları satıp sadece gidiş bileti satın alacağım. İmparator kısmet ederse birikmiş param bitmeden mutlu mesut öleceğim!"
